about_the_game:
Find the answers in the forest before the forest finds its way to you.

Your knight master has gone missing, and the forest holds the key to his disappearance. As a loyal squire, you must delve deep into the heart of the mysterious woods to extract the truth. Armed with nothing but a slingshot, every decision you make could mean the difference between survival and becoming one of the forest's many hidden horrors.

Key Features

Genre: Survival | Adventure | Horror
Immerse yourself in a gripping survival experience where every choice impacts your journey and the unfolding story.

Dynamic, Living World
The forest is not just a backdrop - it's a sentient entity that reacts to your every move. From the sounds you make to the paths you choose, the environment is constantly adapting to challenge you.

Unique Character Interactions
Capture, bribe, threaten, or interrogate the forest’s most peculiar inhabitants. Each interaction can provide valuable information or present new dangers.

Morality System
Your decisions shape your character and influence your relationship with the forest. Will you uphold your morals, or will the forest's darkness consume you?

Precision Combat Mechanics
Equipped only with a slingshot, every shot must be deliberate. Master your aim to survive against the forest’s relentless threats.

Expansive Storyline and Quests
Uncover the forest’s secrets and the fate of your knight master through engaging narrative and diverse side missions.

Atmospheric Graphics and Sound Design
Experience the eerie and mysterious ambiance of a living forest through stunning visuals and immersive audio effects.

Character Development
Gather resources, upgrade your skills, and tailor your strategy to better navigate the forest's challenges.

Why Play This Game?

Unique, Responsive World
Engage with a forest that evolves based on your actions, providing unpredictable challenges in every playthrough.

Compelling Story
Dive into a mysterious tale filled with twists and turns, where every decision influences the outcome.

Engaging Gameplay Mechanics
A blend of survival, action, and adventure horror elements offers a challenging yet rewarding experience.

Join the adventure and see how far you’re willing to go in your quest for the truth…

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 / AMD FX 4350
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core i5-3470 / AMD FX 4350
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 10400f / AMD Ryzen 7 2700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660 / AMD RX 590
  • Storage: 50 GB available space

short_description: A fairytale survival horror. Play as a young squire searching for his missing knight master. Rip answers out of the forest’s strange inhabitants through interrogation, bribery, or threats. Evade the lurking monsters, or slowly become one of them.
